law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b) or (c) of this section, an applicant for a plumber's ...

text.section: In Cecil County, an applicant for a plumber's license shall pay to the clerk a license fee of $30.

An applicant for a plumber's license who is incorporated or has its principal office in another state shall pay to the clerk the fee imposed in that state on a similar nonresident business if that fee is higher than the appropriate license fee under this section.
